_header: My ghostly father I me confess
_description: The ‘confession‘ of a stolen kiss, a roundel by Charles d’Orléans — fourteen lines (two rhymes)

BLHar682.First Lines:
MY gostly fadir y me confesseffirst to god and then to
                    yow…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…That at a wyndow wot ye howI stale a cosse of gret
                    swetnes
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
